rules_text:
Suspend 3–{3}{W} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {3}{W} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)[/i]
When Orbshaper Students enters, if you cast it from exile, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
